tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I strongly recommend  Dr. Eshani Kaul for Root canal treatment as she is very caring, calm, experienced and friendly. I visited her for my son's RCT. Though it was a bit challenging case, she handled it so well. She is superb with kids.She makes the kid to feel comfortable with her constant interactions. They did the treatment by taking all precautions, hygiene and care . Big thumbs up to the whole team of Dr. Sujay's dental clinic for all the care and support extended to us.
reply_text: Thank you for the valuable feedback and support....!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Treatment was fine and also doctor ensured I feel painless and constant interaction during treatment by doctor kept me comfortable.
reply_text: Thank you sir,for the valuable feedback.

review: She is smiling and friendly doctor. Superb with kids n handles with care. She gives warm feeling to her patients.
